actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Agriculture.

official_title: A bill to amend the Emergency Agricultural Credit Adjustment Act of 1978 to require the Secretary of Agriculture to insure or guarantee loans having an aggregate principal balance equal to the maximum amount authorized in such Act.

summary.text: Amends the Emergency Agriculture Credit Adjustment Act to require the Secretary of Agriculture to insure or guarantee loans having an aggregate principal balance equal to the maximum amount authorized in such Act. (Currently, such authority is discretionary.)

titles.title: A bill to amend the Emergency Agricultural Credit Adjustment Act of 1978 to require the Secretary of Agriculture to insure or guarantee loans having an aggregate principal balance equal to the maximum amount authorized in such Act.
